thread.title: BRIEF-Paladin Labs Announces Launch Of New Indication For Xiaflex, Broadening Its Use To The Treatment Of Appropriate Patients With Peyronie's Disease

title: BRIEF-Paladin Labs Announces Launch Of New Indication For Xiaflex, Broadening Its Use To The Treatment Of Appropriate Patients With Peyronie's Disease
text:
Market News  40 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Paladin Labs Announces Launch Of New Indication For Xiaflex, Broadening Its Use To The Treatment Of Appropriate Patients With Peyronie's Disease Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Endo International PLC: 
* PALADIN LABS INC. ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF NEW INDICATION FOR XIAFLEX® (COLLAGENASE CLOSTRIDIUM HISTOLYTICUM), BROADENING ITS USE TO THE TREATMENT OF APPROPRIATE PATIENTS WITH PEYRONIE’S DISEASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
